title: PBE Account.
body: 1. It's not really fair if u been playing for a long time for a certain champion which is thresh and he will get a rework in probably a long time and people just recently played the game but they main the champion that getting a rework so they get a PBE account but others that play champions that getting rework in a long period of time is not really fair though. It's just my opinion{{champion:412}}

replies.body:
Feel free to leave feedback on the [PBE system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) and how we choose testers on the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello, I did left a feedback there. Its just not really fair for players that played for a longtime but their main champion probably get reworked in like couple more years but other get it so easily because they just recently play the champs and some how the champs is getting rework you know? :D
Hello, One of the staff referred me to here by the way
